subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tram, Gibby and Lance — Detroit’s stars the last time it was in the World Series — led the Tigers on the field for three seasons before they were fired last year to make room for Manager Jim Leyland and his staff.
snippet: Tram, Gibby and Lance — Detroit’s stars the last time it was in the World Series — led the Tigers on the field for three seasons before they were fired last year to make room for Manager Jim Leyland and his staff.
